hooks.prompt:
Check if implementation Kotlin files (src/main/kotlin/**/*.kt) were modified in this conversation.

RESPONSE FORMAT - Return ONLY one of these exact JSON responses:

1. If src/main/kotlin files were changed:
{"ok":false,"reason":"REQUIREMENTS.md review needed"}

2. If NO src/main/kotlin files changed (only test files or no Kotlin files):
{"ok":true}

Rules:
- ok must be boolean true or false (NOT strings "true" or "false")
- Return raw JSON only, no markdown, no explanation
